EmailTemplate.name: WO 00 - On Hold Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} move to 00 - On Hold
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
Work Order {!Order.WONameLink__c} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} has been moved to ON HOLD. Please coordinate as a team to make sure all parties understand why the order is on hold and who will be following up to make sure it moves forward in a timely manner.
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
